translations.Securely share data via link: 透過連結安全分享資料
translations.Securely share data with anyone. All dat: 與任何人安全地分享資料。所有資料均由使用者端到端加密，一旦成功擷取就會被刪除
translations.Your secret is stored end-to-end encrypt: 您的祕密以端到端加密儲存於伺服器上。
translations.This secret has already been retrieved a: 此祕密已被擷取，因此其內容已從伺服器刪除。
translations.Could not decrypt secret (key not availa: 無法解密祕密（金鑰在本機無法使用）。
translations.The following secret has been shared wit: 以下祕密已安全地與您分享：
translations.Please make sure you have copied and sto: 請確保您已經在關閉此頁面前複製並儲存了祕密！其現在已在伺服器上刪除。
translations.Copy the secret's content to the clipboa: 將祕密的內容複製到剪貼簿
translations.Download the secret's content as a file: 將祕密的內容另存為檔案
translations.Error loading secret. Is your link corre: 載入祕密時發生錯誤。您的連結正確嗎？
translations.Reveal the secret and delete it on the s: 顯示祕密並在伺服器上刪除
translations.Revealing will delete the secret from th: 顯示祕密將會從伺服器刪除它
translations.The password is wrong or has expired. Pl: 密碼錯誤或過期。請重試。
